features.title: Why Leela Chess Zero?
features.subtitle: Experience a revolutionary approach to chess strategy and analysis.

items.title: A True Learning Machine
items.description: Lc0 uses a powerful neural network that learned chess through self-play, resulting in a unique and intuitive style, free from human bias.

items.title: Unrivaled Positional Insight
items.description: Leela deeply understands long-term strategy, pawn structures, and subtle moves, uncovering insights other engines miss.

items.title: Open Source
items.description: Completely free and open source, developed by a community of enthusiasts and researchers.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: LCZero is powered by a vibrant community of chess enthusiasts, programmers, and researchers.
